description:
goprotobuf: Replace an instance of sync.Mutex with a sync.RWMutex.

We can't change the sync.Mutex in properties.go
because it protects writes to the global stats var.

Fixes issue 21.

messages.text:
Hello r (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://goprotobuf.googlecode.com/hg

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/goprotobuf/source/detail?r=c89ca5f90da1 ***

goprotobuf: Replace an instance of sync.Mutex with a sync.RWMutex.

We can't change the sync.Mutex in properties.go
because it protects writes to the global stats var.

Fixes issue 21.

R=r
CC=golang-dev
